snippet: A three-judge panel’s decision in April to affirm the approval of the landmark settlement will stand, exhausting another appeal.
abstract: Federal appeals court upholds terms of settlement between NFL and former players who claimed league misled them about risks of concussions.
lead_paragraph: A three-judge panel’s decision in April to affirm the approval of the landmark settlement will stand, exhausting another appeal.

headline.main: Appeals Court Won’t Revisit N.F.L. Concussion Settlement
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Won’t Revisit N.F.L. Concussion Deal
